title: Riots Break Out In London, Bus Set On Fire, Police Car Flipped Over

title: Flights, Markets, Banks, Stock Exchange: Microsoft Outage Crippling Sectors

title: Explained: What Is Causing The Dreaded 'Blue Screen Of Death' On Windows?

title: Trump Shooter's Father Called Cops About Missing Gun Before Attack: Report

title: 200-Million-Year-Old "Well-Preserved" Dinosaur Fossil Found In Brazil Flood
content: Torrential rains causing historic flooding in southern Brazil have revealed a "very well-preserved" dinosaur fossil dating back some 200 million years, according to the research team who discovered it.
summary: Torrential rains causing historic flooding in southern Brazil have revealed a "very well-preserved" dinosaur fossil dating back some 200 million years, according to the research team who discovered it.

title: Donald Trump Accepts Republican Nomination Amid Chants Of USA From Crowd

title: 7.4- Magnitude Earthquake Hits Northern Chile
